item.title: Filter
item.description: Overview The filter script is tailored for searching IP addresses and domains in Zeek logs. However, it is flexible enough that it can be used for other purpsoses as well. filter has several special features. By default, it: Searches in the current directory tree for any conn.log files, including compressed files and rotated logs. Searches files in parallel using multiple cores. Uses faster alternatives to grep like ripgrep or ugrep, when available.
